doc:
James Van Der Beek https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Van_Der_Beek 0 James David Van Der Beek (born March 8, 1977) is an American actor best known for his portrayal of Dawson Leery in the WB series Dawson's Creek. He played a fictionalized version of himself on the cult ABC sitcom Don't Trust the B---- in Apartment 23, and, most recently, starred in CSI: Cyber as FBI Special Agent Elijah Mundo. His film roles include Varsity Blues (1999) and The Rules of Attraction (2002). James_David_Van_Der_Beek ( born March_8_,_1977 ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_portrayal of Dawson_Leery in the_WB_series_Dawson 's_Creek . He played a_fictionalized_version of himself on the_cult_ABC_sitcom Do n't Trust the_B ---- in Apartment_23 , and , most_recently , starred in CSI : Cyber as FBI_Special_Agent_Elijah_Mundo . His_film_roles include Varsity_Blues_(_1999 ) and The_Rules of Attraction_(_2002_) .
